channel.title: CVE Feed for JumpDEMAND Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JumpDEMAND Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-36296|2024-08-03T10:00:04.540Z -- jumpdemand%20inc. -- activedemand
item.description: Broken Authentication vulnerability in JumpDEMAND Inc. ActiveDEMAND plugin <= 0.2.27 at WordPress allows unauthenticated post update/create/delete.

item.title: CVE-2024-35638|2024-08-02T03:14:53.817Z -- jumpdemand%20inc. -- activedemand
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in JumpDEMAND Inc. ActiveDEMAND.This issue affects ActiveDEMAND: from n/a through 0.2.43.

item.title: CVE-2024-32809|2024-06-04T17:52:19.821Z -- jumpdemand%20inc. -- activedemand
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in JumpDEMAND Inc. ActiveDEMAND allows Using Malicious Files.This issue affects ActiveDEMAND: from n/a through 0.2.41.
